snippet: South Korea celebrated a win over rival North Korea at the Asian Games, winning the gold medal in the men’s soccer final, 1-0, in Incheon, South Korea.
abstract: South Korea defeats North Korea, 1-0, at the Asian Games, winning gold medal in the men's soccer final.
lead_paragraph: South Korea celebrated a win over rival North Korea at the Asian Games, winning the gold medal in the men’s soccer final, 1-0, in Incheon, South Korea.
